qDef.description:
Definition of the expression in the measure.
 Example: Sum (OrderTotal)

qRelative.description: If set to true, percentage values are returned instead of absolute numbers

qBrutalSum.description: If set to true, the sum of rows total should be used rather than real expression total

qAggrFunc.description: Aggregate function. The default value is 0 (Sum of rows)

qAccumulate.description:
0 means no accumulation
1 means full accumulation (each y-value accumulates all previous y-values of the expression)
â‰¥ 2 means accumulate as many steps as the qAccumulate value

qReverseSort.description: If set to true, it inverts the sort criteria in the field

qActiveExpression.description: Index of the active expression in a cyclic measure. The indexing starts from 0.

qExpressions.description: If set to true, it inverts the sort criteria in the field

qLibraryId.description: Refers to a measure stored in the library

qDef.description:
Definition of the expression in the measure.
 Example: Sum (OrderTotal)

qCalcCond.description: Specifies a calculation condition, which must be fulfilled for the measure to be calculated

qExpression.description: Definition of the attribute expression. Example: Max(OrderID)
